Usage: anyrepo manifest [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]...

  Manifest Information.

Options:
  -h, --help  Show this message and exit.

Commands:
  freeze    Print The Resolved Manifest With SHAs For All Project Revisions.
  path      Print Path to Main Manifest File.
  paths     Print Paths to ALL Manifest Files.
  resolve   Print The Manifest With All Imports Resolved.
  validate  Validate The Current Manifest, Exiting With An Error On Issues.
